name: I wanna go to the store to buy milk
name_original: I wanna go to the store to buy milk
description:
-Controls-

Arrow keys to move

Z to jump and double jump

X to shoot

Q to die

                                   -Credits-

SilvaGunner for the level music

I Wanna Be The Guy for the sprites

Mario Paint for the end music

I'm not gonna sugarcoat it, this was made with Scratch. I just exported it as a zip file.

Made to showcase "I wanna be the Engine!"

Link to that: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/683246227/
